price: Nikasema: Ombeni msamaha kwa Mola wenu Mlezi; hakika Yeye ni Mwingi wa kusamehe.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا
footnotes: Nikawambia watu wangu: Takeni kwa Mola wenu Mlezi maghfira kwa kufru zenu na maasi yenu. Kwani Yeye bado ni Mwingi wa kusamehe madhambi ya mwenye kurejea kwake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
